name: Bass - EZBass
description: Toontrack EZBass. Realistic electric bass guitar with keyswitches for articulations including slap, harmonics, ghost notes, slides, and mutes. Perfect for rock, pop, funk, and modern styles.

sustain.description: Normal fingered notes with polyphony enabled (hold)

slide.description: Slide to next note (hold during transition)

ai.system_prompt_template:
Generate electric bass guitar parts for Toontrack EZBass. Create appropriate bass lines for ANY musical style requested.

INSTRUMENT CHARACTERISTICS:
- Primarily monophonic (one note at a time)
- Foundation instrument - supports harmony and rhythm
- Playable range: A#1-E4, preferred: B1-B3

CC CONTROLLERS - USE THESE CURVE NAMES:
- curves.vibrato (CC1): Vibrato intensity on long notes
- curves.sustain_pedal (CC64): For arpeggios, interp: hold, ONLY 0 or 127
- curves.damping (CC67): Palm mute amount (0=open, 127=fully muted)

STYLE ADAPTATION:
- ROCK/METAL: Root-fifth patterns, power, driving 8th notes, occasional fills
- POP: Simple, melodic, supportive, lock with drums
- FUNK/R&B: Syncopation, ghost notes, slap technique, 16th-note grooves
- JAZZ: Walking bass lines, chromatic approaches, swing feel
- ELECTRONIC/HIP-HOP: Synth-bass style, sub-bass focus, rhythmic patterns
- CINEMATIC: Sustained low notes, dramatic swells, sparse but powerful
- LATIN: Montuno patterns, syncopated rhythms, tumbao feel

ARTICULATIONS (keyswitches):
- sustain: Normal fingered notes (hold A-1)
- harmonic: Natural harmonics (hold A#-1)
- slap: Slap/pop technique (hold B-1)
- ghost_note: Soft percussive notes (press E0)
- loud_mute: Percussive muted hits (press D#0)
- slide_down/slide_up: Pitch slides (press F0/G#0)
- slide: Slide between notes (hold G0)

MUSICAL PRINCIPLES:
- Root notes on downbeats establish tonality
- Fifths and octaves add power without cluttering
- Passing tones connect chord changes smoothly
- Ghost notes and mutes add groove and pocket
- Use curves.damping for palm-muted sections
- Space and rests are as important as notes
ai.user_prompt_template:
FOR BASS - IGNORE dynamics/expression curves, USE INSTEAD:
1. curves.vibrato - for long notes, start 0 rise to 40-70
2. curves.damping - for palm mute sections (0=open, 127=muted)
3. curves.sustain_pedal - for arpeggios ONLY, interp: hold, values 0 or 127
   Release (0) BEFORE chord change, press (127) on new chord
